name: A Strange Disease
description:
Where am i...?

What's up with this house and this strange people living in it?
Can i reveal the secret in here?

-------------------

A STRANGE DISEASE is a classic point and click adventure made in austria with the visionaire game engine.

Available languages:
Interface: German, English
Subtitles: German, English
Spoken Language: not supported

-------------------

Controls:
Right click: somewhere in the room to move
Right click: on objekt to pick it up / on a person to talk to it (when the textbox appears you have to choose a sentence to say it)
Left click: somewhere in the room to view inverntory
Left click: on object in the inventory to look at it closer
Esc: view main menu / leave main menu

You can combine objects in the inventory or combine objects from the inventory with object in the room.

-------------------
